content:
SAEED MIRZAMOHAMMADI

Ph.D. Candidate
Computer Science Department
University of California, Irvine
Email: saeed at uci dot edu
Office: Donald Bren Hall #3231
ABOUT ME         PUBLICATIONS         CONTACT         CV         GITHUB

Publication

Scholar

  • Zhihao Yao, Saeed Mirzamohammadi, Ardalan Amiri Sani, Mathias Payer, "Milkomeda: Safeguarding the Mobile GPU Interface Using WebGL Security Checks," in Proc. ACM Conference on Computer and Communications Security (CCS), October 2018.
    •  
  • Saeed Mirzamohammadi, Ardalan Amiri Sani, "The Case for a Virtualization-Based Trusted Execution Environment in Mobile Devices," in Proc. ACM SIGOPS Asia-Pacific Workshop on Systems (APSys), August 2018.

    Nominated for Best Paper Award.

    •  
  • Saeed Mirzamohammadi, Ardalan Amiri Sani, "Viola: Trustworthy Sensor Notifications for Enhanced Privacy on Mobile Systems," in IEEE Transactions on Mobile Computing (TMC), 2018, (extended version of our MobiSys'16 paper).
    •  
  • Saeed Mirzamohammadi, Justin A. Chen, Ardalan Amiri Sani, Sharad Mehrotra, Gene Tsudik, "Ditio: Trustworthy Auditing of Sensor Activities in Mobile & IoT Devices," in Proc. ACM Int. Conf. Embedded Networked Sensor Systems (SenSys), (acceptance rate: 26/151, 18%), November 2017.
    •  
  • Zongheng Ma, Saeed Mirzamohammadi, Ardalan Amiri Sani, "Understanding Sensor Notifications on Mobile Devices", in Proc. ACM Int. Workshop on Mobile Computing Systems and Applications (HotMobile), (acceptance rate: 18/51, 35%)., February 2017.
    •  
  • Saeed Mirzamohammadi, Ardalan Amiri Sani, "Viola: Trustworthy Sensor Notifications for Enhanced Privacy on Mobile Systems", in Proc. ACM Int. Conf. Mobile Systems, Applications and Services (MobiSys), (acceptance rate: 31/197, 16%), June 2016 (video demo) (source code).
    •  
  • [Poster] Saeed Mirzamohammadi, Ardalan Amiri Sani, "Viola: Trustworthy Sensor Notifications for Enhanced Privacy on Mobile Systems", in The 17th Int. Workshop on Mobile Computing Systems and Applications (HotMobile), February 2016.
    •  
  • Siavash Rezaei, Cesar-Alejandro Hernandez-Calderon, Saeed Mirzamohammadi, Eli Bozorgzadeh, Alexander Veidenbaum, Alex Nicolau, Michael J. Prather, "Data-rate-aware FPGA-based acceleration framework for streaming applications" in Int. Conf. on ReConFigurable Computing and FPGAs (ReConFig), November 2016.
